declarations.name: default
declarations.description: Creates and exports the API handler for the TanStack React Start application, delegating all incoming requests to the Hono server instance. This is the entry point for serverless or edge deployments, wiring the TanStack React Start API system to the Hono server's fetch handler.

request.description: The incoming HTTP request to be handled.

returns.description: A response generated by the Hono server for the incoming request.

declarations.implementationNotes: Uses createStartAPIHandler from @tanstack/react-start/api to wrap the Hono server's fetch method, passing through the NODE_ENV environment variable.
